```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
E <- sample(100:999, 1) # electric field (N/C)
q <- signif(runif(1, 2, 9.99), 2) # charge (mC)

ans <- q * 1e-3 * E  # coulomb force (N)

sc <- num_to_schoice(ans, delta = ans/10, format = FALSE)
sc$questions <- sprintf("%g N", signif(sc$questions, 2))
```
Question
========
What is the force on a $+`r fmt(q,1)` \,\mathsf{mC}$ charge when placed in a
uniform electric field of strength $`r E` \,\mathsf{N/C}$?

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```

Solution
========
The force on a charge in an electric field is

$$F = qE = (`r q` \times 10^{-3} \,\mathsf{C})(`r E` \,\mathsf{N/C}) = `r signif(ans, 2)` \,\mathsf{N}$$
